title: Font ID
content:
Can anyone help identify this font? It looks familiar, but I can't seem to find a good match. Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-05-12%20at%208_5821.49.39%20AM.png)
author: JEG

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/flareserif-821/bold/glyphs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190148/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/flareserif-821/bold/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/flareserif-821/bold/glyphs.html")

a.k.a. Albertus Bold, manually condensed a bit…
Looks like [Friz Quadrata Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190148/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/friz-quadrata/), a bit squashed.

Thanks for the quick feedback. I think those are close, but not exact. I think Flareserif 821 is a closer match than Friz.

I've attached the full version of the image. Maybe the 'E' could give more insight.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sign_4901.jpg)
The sign could just be a custom rendition a font. Thanks for the help everyone!
